title: MAC Recent slow loading times
body:
These recent patches have made my loading times to unbearable. Before preseason patch it was black screen > loading screen > everyone reaches ~20% at the same time and then I'm in game. Now a few patches into preseason its 3 minute wait time for the game launcher > white screen > 1 min wait time > loading screen > waiting for me to reach 100% which basically puts me in game at 4 mins or more. I can't even load in the game at the same time as everyone anymore.

Is there a way to fix it or perhaps bring back the old method of loading?

Model: iMac (21.5-inch, Late 2013)

replies.body: If anyone else has the same problem I fixed the solution by turning off my Avira real-time protection. Loads in 1 minute instead of 3.
